title: Mad Games Tycoon v0.150916A
description:
Title: Mad Games Tycoon
Genre: Casual, Indie, Simulation, Strategy, Early Access
Developer: Eggcode 
Publisher: Eggcode	
Release Date: 5 Jan, 2015
Crack: 3DM

Hotfix: 0.150916A

- The tutorial is available again. 
- The settings (AI, walls etc.) can now be activated with "LeftShift + F1" etc. 
- If you choose the genre for a new game, you can now see the bonus. 
- (My Games > Turnover) There the profit is now calculated and displayed. 
- If you have updated an engine, you get now again the purchase price by NPCs. 
- Bug removed: (Game start) The skills for the own player was not transferred correctly. 
- Bug removed: You could not choose China. 
- Bug removed: The employees have continuously complained about the lack of heating. 
- Bug removed: (Mad Games Awards) Mistakenly was shown that you received new fans. 
- Bug removed: Games of subsidiaries had always 0 stars. 
- Bug removed: Employees will be hidden, if you buy an object or room. 
- Bug removed: (Develop Successor) Sometimes the game name was not displayed. 
- Bug removed: (Statistics > developers) Setting of minimum quality has not worked. 
- Bug removed: If you have taken more than one employee, the display was positioned incorrectly. 
- Bug removed: (My Games > Bundles) All buttons were positioned incorrectly. 
- Various minor bugs fixed.
